name: esm-with-http2
description: Researching how ESM works with HTTP/2 and whether it can replace bundlers like Webpack

scripts.postinstall: cd docs && npm install && cd .. && npm run build
scripts.build:cert: openssl genrsa -des3 -passout pass:x -out keys/server.pass.key 2048 && openssl rsa -passin pass:x -in keys/server.pass.key -out keys/server.key && rm keys/server.pass.key && openssl req -new -key keys/server.key -out keys/server.csr -subj "/C=UK/ST=Warwickshire/L=Leamington/O=OrgName/OU=IT Department/CN=localhost" && openssl x509 -req -sha256 -days 365 -in keys/server.csr -signkey keys/server.key -out keys/server.crt
scripts.build: npm run build:cert && cd docs && npm run build

author: Gil Tayar <gil@tayar.org>
